title: What is the interest rate in EzySave by Maybank
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

The annual interest rate in EzySave+ by Maybank is **0.1875%**Â with **no minimum deposit** and **no maintaining balance**.

To earn interest, you must have a maintaining balance of at least P0.01.
